# Further Resources

Check out The Turing Way [Youtube Channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCPDxZv5BMzAw0mPobCbMNuA).

Have a look at the [UK Reproducibility Network's](https://www.ukrn.org) activities.

Watch [Florian Markowetz's talk](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Is15CMVPHas&feature=youtu.be) on '5 selfish reasons to work reproducibly' at SciData 2016.

Baker, M. (2016). 1,500 scientists lift the lid on reproducibility. Nature, 533(7604), 452–454. https://doi.org/10.1038/533452a

The Turing Way Community, Becky Arnold, Louise Bowler, Sarah Gibson, Patricia Herterich, Rosie Higman, … Kirstie Whitaker. (2019, March 25). The Turing Way: A Handbook for Reproducible Data Science (Version v0.0.4). Zenodo. http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3233986
